docs.snippet: False Veronica, the head rush and stiff Meirich have gone, as have the fish otter and the tree frog, and now the man who was supposed to protect them, Dr. Bernard Grzimek, has gone, too....
docs.lead_paragraph: False Veronica, the head rush and stiff Meirich have gone, as have the fish otter and the tree frog, and now the man who was supposed to protect them, Dr. Bernard Grzimek, has gone, too.
docs.abstract: Dr B Grzimek, prominent naturalist apptd by Chancellor Brandt 3 yrs ago as Fed Govt's Wildlife Protection Comr, resigns post; contents of resignation lr have not been disclosed but friends of Grzimek rept he was embittered by lack of funds and personnel and by indifference of Fed mins; note he complained that Brandt Govt's accomplishments in protecting environment are 'far behind' those of GB, Sweden and the Netherlands; Grzimek reptdly felt Govt was using him to conceal its own lack of activity

headline.main: A BONN ECOLOGIST QUITS IN PROTEST; Death Sentence' Many Animals Extinct Brandt Effort to Preserve Wildlife Termed a Sham

byline.original: By DAVID BINDERSpecial to The New York Times

docs.snippet: I OFTEN ask, and am asked, when should you respond to a critic? The answer is: virtually never. For several reasons. It makes you look like a poor sport, thinskinned, and one who can't take it....

docs.abstract: D Cavett lr scores J J O'Connor Jan 30 belittling rev of his programs with L Olivier and O Welles; notes dangers in responding to critic but says time to respond is when you know you have done something good
